member.name: M:EPiServer.Cms.TinyMce.Core.TinyMceConfiguration.Get``1(``0,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a clone of the for the given property on the given content type.
member.remarks: If no settings are configured for the given model property, then a clone of the default settings will be returned.
member.typeparam: The type of the content containing the given property.
member.returns: A clone of the for the given model property if configured; otherwise a clone of the default settings.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Cms.TinyMce.Core.TinyMceConfiguration.For``1(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Object}},EPiServer.Cms.TinyMce.Core.TinyMceSettings)
member.summary: Sets the for a given property on a given content type.
member.param: The property to configure to a settings instance for.
The to use for the given model property. This will override any previous configuration.
member.typeparam: The type of the content containing the given property.
member.returns: The that were configured for the given property. If the copyFrom parameter is set then a clone of this will be returned. Otherwise it will return the settings instance associated with the property; falling back to a clone of the default settings if nothing has been previously configured.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Cms.TinyMce.Core.TinyMceConfiguration.Use``2(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Object}},System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``1,System.Object}})
member.summary: Use the from one property for another property.
member.param: The property containing the to use.
member.typeparam: The type of the content containing the source property.
The type of the content containing the target property.
member.exception: An exception will be thrown when there is no configured for the source property.
